CIPHER.0.cipherString: Never miss an opportunity to make others happy, even if you have to leave them alone in order to do it.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,13).

CIPHER.2.cipherString: I got into this business because I like acting and I want to make movies. I would be happy living the rest of my life never famous.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,9).

CIPHER.3.cipherString: But, I understand that Black Comb and Whistler are supposed to be great for snowboarding. So I am looking forward to going there someday soon.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(7,13).

CIPHER.4.cipherString: We know from science that nothing in the universe exists as an isolated or independent entity.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,10).

CIPHER.5.cipherString: You're never guaranteed about next year. People ask what you think of next season, you have to seize the opportunities when they're in front of you.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,24).

CIPHER.6.cipherString: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
CIPHER.6.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(19,15).

CIPHER.7.cipherString: My best work is often almost unconscious and occurs ahead of my ability to understand it.
CIPHER.7.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(17,18).

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Every day, I get closer to God. Every day, my will to do the right thing gets stronger.
CIPHER.8.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(7,15).

CIPHER.9.cipherString: In the end, you're measured not by how much you undertake but by what you finally accomplish.
CIPHER.9.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(17,21).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: Friendship is held to be the severest test of character. It is easy, we think, to be loyal to a family and clan, whose blood is in your own veins.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,7).
